item.title: Display or filter VMs that are restarted by VMware HA
item.description: When VMware High Availability(HA) comes in action, the VMs are restarted (depending on the HA settings) on other VMware ESX servers in the cluster. Itâ€™s handy to know what VMs are restarted. In the vCenter client the Tasks and Events page size can be increased. Default the vCenter client displays 100 tasks and events.
